plot outline: Aadhi, played by Rameez Raja, was helping his father, in running a mobile phone shop, with no big aim in life. One day, he met Divya, a college girl and fell in love instantly. On the day when he was planning to propose, both of them were kidnapped by two gangs for different reasons. When Aadhi, Divya and their family members got killed by a gangster, Aadhi woke up to realize that what he witnessed was a terrible nightmare and felt relaxed. But his happiness was short-lived, as he started to realize that his dream was slowly shaping into a horrible reality. Did he avoid the inevitable end? That's rest of the story.
